title: Finneas, Ashe Announce New Band, The Favors, and Debut Album
caption: 🎸 New music alert! 🎶 Finneas and Ashe team up as The Favors for a hot debut album drop! 🔥 Who's ready to jam? 🎉 #TheFavors #MusicNews

title: Rick Astley’s “Never Gonna Give You Up” Rickrolls Past 1 Billion Spotify Streams
caption: 🎉 Rick Astley just Rickrolled past 1 billion Spotify streams! 🕺🎶 Who's ready to sing along? #NeverGonnaGiveYouUp #RickAstley

title: Nandi Bushell Performs Radiohead’s “Everything in Its Right Place” on Drums, Piano, and Vocals: Watch
caption: 🥁🎹 Nandi Bushell impresses with her multi-instrumental talent on Radiohead's "Everything in Its Right Place"! 🌟 Watch her bring the magic! 🎶 #MusicMonday

title: Tears for Fears Add New Dates to Las Vegas Residency
caption: 🎉 Las Vegas just got even more fabulous! @tearsforfears have added more dates to their residency! Who's ready for an unforgettable night? 💃🎶 #TearsForFears #LasVegasResidency

title: Superchunk Announce New Album, Share New Song: Listen
caption: 🎸 Pump up the volume! Superchunk is back with a brand-new album and a killer new track! 🎶 #rockout #newmusicalert
